name: Don’t Stress It
content: 我们的生活不总是如愿以偿
想要做些事情但又显得自己格格不入
我们会受伤但没有关系
No need to play the blame game
我们无需在游戏中你争我夺
You may feel the world is over
But no you are getting closer
但不要怕 希望会越来越大
It's all I got to tell you
耐心一点 不要放弃
You will shine shine after the rain
What you feel can always change
直到你的伤痛完全愈合
Till I heal all your pain
对于别人的话也要有个态度
把所有的怨恨丢进下水道
不要让消极的情绪阻碍你
但不要怕 希望会越来越大
Rather love than show you hate
You may feel the world is over
耐心一点 不要放弃
But no you are getting closer
It's all I got to tell you
You will shine  shine after the rain
直到你的伤痛完全愈合
What you feel can always change
Till I heal all your pain
直到你的伤痛完全愈合
